General.Name: Huafang Co Ltd
General.Description: Huafang Co., Ltd engages in the printing, dyeing, and spinning of clothing and textile products in China and internationally. It offers home textiles, fabrics, bedding, clothing, blue platinum, and fiber series products. The company is also involved in the thermal, chemical, real estate, and other businesses. In addition, it provides information and financial services. The company was founded in 1976 and is based in Binzhou, China.
